name: Roomba Quest 3
description:
I've been planning this for a while, but it refused to take shape.

Then two things happened: The secrets and quests in Elden Ring annoyed me, and I discovered Bitsy3D.

This game does not save progress. Please set aside an hour to play.

Controls

W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move / bump.

Click and drag with mouse pointer to rotate the room.

More Roomba Quest

You do not need to play Roomba Quest 1 or Roomba Quest 2, but there are returning characters.

Thanks:

Volatile contributions: AJ Kerr, Noel Austin. Alex Crouzen, Dan Pearson, Adam Burt, Tera Birchall, Andrew Crawshaw, Denzel Dome, Errol Seymour, Duncan Stead, Johnny Wallbank, Dan Thomas, Nabeena Mali, Lauren Stevens, Jon Ingold.

Testing: Bitsy Discord, Em, GingerBread, Rynelf, mumbles

This game was made using Bitsy3D.
